meanings.definition: The state or quality of being kooky.
meanings.sent1: Her kookinesses always made us smile.
meanings.sent2: The party was full of kookinesses, from the decorations to the music.
meanings.sent3: His kookinesses shone through when he wore mismatched socks to work.
meanings.sent4: The town's kookinesses were like a colorful painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The kookinesses of the old house gave it a unique charm.

meanings.definition: Behaviors or characteristics that are eccentric or unconventional.
meanings.sent1: The artist's kookinesses inspired others to think outside the box.
meanings.sent2: She embraced her kookinesses and stood out in a crowd.
meanings.sent3: The kookinesses of his fashion sense always turned heads.
meanings.sent4: In a world of conformity, her kookinesses were a breath of fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The kookinesses of the inventor led to groundbreaking discoveries.
